preface.title: Preface
preface.para: The primary goal of Apache Bigtop is to build a community around the packaging and interoperability testing of Hadoop-related projects. This includes testing at various levels (packaging, platform, runtime, upgrade, etc...) developed by a community with a focus on the system as a whole, rather than individual projects.

section.title: Who should read this guide?
section.para:
If you are reading this guide, you are obviously interested in
Apache Hadoop
and distributed systems.
This guide will be useful if you want to deploy your own cluster whether it is on virtual machines in a cloud or on real hardware in a datacenter or bedroom.

No specific knowledge will be assumed and every topic will be introduced. However be mindful that distributed systems, and in particular
Apache Hadoop
, are complex systems. While exciting and innovative, they can also be a great source of frustration. The goal of this user guide is to prevent frustrations and to keep that experience rewarding.
